translations: v.以……自豪（pride 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 头等重要的位置；首要地位；傲慢
[古语]排场;虚荣[亦作 pride of the world]
处于…的顶峰(或最佳状态)
清晨的薄雾和阵雨(天晴的预兆)

sentences.sentence: Someone put a donkey on it and clapped, says one man, priding himself on Hama's sense of humour.
sentences.translation: 一名男子说，曾有人把一条驴子拴在其上并拍手，为哈马式的幽默而备感自豪。

sentences.sentence: Network Technology is greatly priding of its reputation of high level credit and reasonable after-sales service.
sentences.translation: 沃科特公司以良好的信誉，及时的售后服务而受到客户们的好评。
